metadata.title: CVE-2021-24031 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In the Zstandard command-line utility prior to v1.4.1, output files were created with default permissions. Correct file permissions (matching the input) would only be set at completion time. Output files could therefore be readable or writable to unintended parties.

criterions.comment: libzstd package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.8+dfsg-1').
